message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be of great value to you.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $9,000 is too low. Could you do $11,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $11,000 is a bit steep. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $10,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
